sent.orig: If so, then listened to album Zhang Jie, you may be on the album's unexpected performance.
sent.trans: 如果是这样，那么听过张杰的这张专辑，你或许就会对这张专辑的表现出人意料。

sent.trans: 产品遍步海内外，因之老三木板相册在相册界闻名遐迩。

sent.orig: Beware of power metal album covers that look like black metal album covers-deception can be brutal.
sent.trans: 提防看起来像黑色金属的力量金属专辑封面——欺骗很可怕。

sent.orig: Among K.W. 8 Grammy nods, his album Graduation is up for album of the year.
sent.trans: 在K.W.的8项格莱美奖提名中，他的唱片《毕业生》雄踞今年唱片之首。

sent.orig: Artist, album and track names, as well as the album art are shown for recognized files.
sent.trans: 被识别完毕的文件会显示其艺术家，专辑，歌曲名称，还有专辑艺术类别等等。
